prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 24985
completion: The HyWorks Desktop Agent logs an "An invalid argument was supplied" error after the IP address of a VM is changed.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 24930
completion: The VM scale booster does not create the required firewall rule for port 5672, which is the port used by desktop agents to communicate. The rule has to be created manually if the Windows firewall is enabled on the VM scale booster server.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 24000
completion: The latest VM scale booster v3.4.0.80 is incompatible with older versions of HyWorks controllers (v3.3-R3(13832) or lower).

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 23975
completion: During installation, no appropriate logs are generated by the VM scale booster if it is unable to configure AccopsMQ.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 23963
completion: If the Desktop Agent service is restarted during a running session that has recording enabled, the recorded file may be corrupted and fails to upload.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 23824
completion: Providing a user administrative privileges does not work on VMs with a Japanese OS.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 23823
completion: The HyWorks Desktop agent is unable to process a user with Japanese characters in their username and the session logs out.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 23414
completion: When the HyWorks Windows DVM Tools is uninstalled, the firewall rules created for built-in USB redirection driver are not removed and need to be removed manually.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 22385
completion: When DVM Tools are upgraded/repaired, the same version of the built-in USB redirection driver gets uninstalled and is re-installed, requiring a reboot.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 22370
completion: While installing the latest DVM tools, the option to install the USB redirection driver is checked by default, even if the latest version of the USB redirection driver is already installed.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 22027
completion: Upgrading the DVM tools may fail or the replacement of the new binaries of integrated components e.g. AUEM, recording modules may fail, when the upgrade is performed during a running session.Recommendations: Upgrades should be done when there are no running sessions on the VM.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 18844
completion: The DVM Tools installer enters a non-responsive mode momentarily during un-installation.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools 18102
completion: The VM Scale booster logs display the customization status as not initiated even when the customization option is not enabled.

prompt: Limitations and Issues of Personal Desktop Delivery and Windows DVM Tools None
